div.a: Meet The Data Brains Behind The Rise Of Facebook

div.div: Facebook infrastructure now spans four data centers in four separate parts of the world, tens of thousands of computer servers, and more software tools than you could list without taking a deep breath in the middle of it all. These are the guys who keep track of it all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WlA1k2&via=Digg&text=Meet The Data Brains Behind The Rise Of Facebook

div.a: Watch The Superdome Control Room Calmly Resolve Power Outage Like A Boss

div.div: Kudos to the Superdome control-room employees, who, new video suggests, handled the 35-minute Super Bowl power outage without cursing, sweating, or throwing a single walkie-talkie through the glass window of their Superdome box in frustration.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YyyNT2&via=Digg&text=Watch The Superdome Control Room Calmly Resolve Power Outage Like A Boss

div.a: The Most Absurdly Elaborate Scheme To Stop Cats Forever

div.div: If for some reason feral cats are a problem for you, this device will scar them for life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XFUzDt&via=Digg&text=The Most Absurdly Elaborate Scheme To Stop Cats Forever

div.div: Today is Facebook's ninth birthday. Meet the students who celebrated its birth — and find out where they are now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YxJoxv&via=Digg&text=The First 25 People On Facebook

div.a: The Best Lines From Nokia's Absurdly Positive Review Of Its Own Windows Phone

div.div: "Like a kid on Christmas morning, I grabbed the delivery bag, tore it open, and glanced at the contents — a blue box with the words 'Nokia Lumia 620' printed on it."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VzQEGP&via=Digg&text=The Best Lines From Nokia's Absurdly Positive Review Of Its Own Windows Phone

div.a: Fearless Felix Went Even Faster Than We Thought

div.div: It turns out that supersonic man Felix Baumgartner was even more supersonic than we previously thought.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XGb2rf&via=Digg&text=Fearless Felix Went Even Faster Than We Thought

div.div: As the investigation into the Apollo 1 disaster unfolded, the accident took on a sinister tone with allegations that the crew were responsible for their own deaths or were victims of murder.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11CuydP&via=Digg&text=The Apollo 1 Conspiracy Theory

div.a: The Greeks Would Have Thought We Were Crazy

div.div: One of the guns used to murder children and adults in Newtown, Connecticut, was an AR-15, a semiautomatic rifle that’s similar to a weapon used in war by American troops. A weapon of war was turned on innocents at home. That would have shocked the ancient Greeks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XYUrO1&via=Digg&text=The Greeks Would Have Thought We Were Crazy

div.a: Why Malware Warnings Took Over The Internet Today

div.div: If you're a Chrome user, chance are a malware warning page popped up on your screen at some point on Monday. Here's why.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VMn4je&via=Digg&text=Why Malware Warnings Took Over The Internet Today

div.div: How an eccentric photographer invented modern visual culture.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XDAbCW&via=Digg&text=The Grandfather Of The GIF

div.div: YOU DON'T WANT TO RIDE THIS TRAIN

By the middle of this century, a large chunk of the United States’ nuclear arsenal could be located on a doomsday subway system, where unmanned cars move back and forth on a single track, prepared to launch at a moment’s notice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Umur48&via=Digg&text=The Doomsday Train

div.a: How Do You Serve A Ping Pong Ball At The Speed Of Sound?

div.div: An engineering professor has created an air gun that can fire a ping pong ball at 900 miles per hour.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VDKxGJ&via=Digg&text=How Do You Serve A Ping Pong Ball At The Speed Of Sound?

div.div: Would there be a Facebook without Mark Zuckerberg? Nine years later, his Harvard classmates weigh in.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11CfHQE&via=Digg&text=The Earliest Adopters

div.a: The Complete Guide To Selling Your Unwanted Crap For Money

div.div: In this guide, we'll walk you through how you can appraise your items, where to sell them to make the most cash, and how to avoid geting screwed in the process.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WTRmll&via=Digg&text=The Complete Guide To Selling Your Unwanted Crap For Money

div.div: GOD CREATED CAPITALISTS, AND IT WAS GOOD
"I need somebody with strong, undocumented laborers. Strong enough to rustle a calf, yet gentle enough to understand the economic need to ignore minimum wage and overtime laws." So God made a farmer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WKb5UT&via=Digg&text=So God Made A Farmer

div.a: Why Are Japanese School Buses So Much Better Than Our School Buses?

div.div: I want my son to ride a rocket-bus to school. jalopnik.com/5981543/why-are-j... #jalopnik #japan #kawaii

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11L01G6&via=Digg&text=Why Are Japanese School Buses So Much Better Than Our School Buses?

div.a: A Canadian's Requiem For The Penny

div.div: Today marks the last day of Canada’s one-cent coin, as the Royal Canadian Mint starts to phase it out of circulation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11K3wg7&via=Digg&text=A Canadian's Requiem For The Penny

div.a: Is This Meteorite A Piece Of Mercury?

div.div: Pieces of the Moon and Mars have been found on Earth before, as well as chunks of Vesta and other asteroids, but what about the innermost planet, Mercury?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TxqLLb&via=Digg&text=Is This Meteorite A Piece Of Mercury?

div.a: 'Spacewar!' The Story Of The World's First Digital Video Game

div.div: A panel at the Museum of the Moving Image delves into the making of the 1961 space shooter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y5jLSI&via=Digg&text='Spacewar!' The Story Of The World's First Digital Video Game

div.a: Doubts Remain As To Whether The Parking Lot Skeleton Is In Fact Richard III

div.div: Mitochondrial DNA is not especially good for pinpointing identity, so how sure can we be that the "car-park skeleton" is that of Richard III?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLIP2Q&via=Digg&text=Doubts Remain As To Whether The Parking Lot Skeleton Is In Fact Richard III

div.div: RATS OF THE SKY HAVE MANY FACES

div.a: So You Think You Know What A Pigeon Looks Like

div.div: They might be called the “Rat of the sky,” but Charles Darwin certainly saw something in this bird. It turns out the father of evolution saw in the pigeon an amazing variety of variation in color, shape and form.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XFZ1Sq&via=Digg&text=So You Think You Know What A Pigeon Looks Like

div.a: How Many Years Of Life Have Been Lost To Gun Violence?

div.div: Thousands have been killed by gun violence in the US, but what does that mean? Periscopic have taken FBI crime report data detailing every gun murder in 2010 and then combined the numbers with WHO demographic statistics to work out the impact in years lost.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TzIDFh&via=Digg&text=How Many Years Of Life Have Been Lost To Gun Violence?

div.div: This is how music gets inside your head.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14IVSqr&via=Digg&text=The Psychology Of Music

div.a: How To Build A F1 Car

div.div: A F1 car is probably the most impressive feat of engineering that moves on four wheels. Watch as Red Bull assembles their 2013 car.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UiAVki&via=Digg&text=How To Build A F1 Car

div.a: Drunk Eyewitnesses Are Just As Reliable As Sober Eyewitnesses

div.div: Would you trust the testimony of a witness who admitted to being drunk while observing a crime? You should.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14MLG0a&via=Digg&text=Drunk Eyewitnesses Are Just As Reliable As Sober Eyewitnesses

div.div: STALKING: THERE'S AN APP FOR THAT

div.a: Facebook Said To Create App That Tracks Your Location

div.div: Facebook is developing a smartphone application that will track the location of users, two people with knowledge of the matter said, bolstering efforts to benefit from growing use of social media on mobile computers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WMGJxX&via=Digg&text=Facebook Said To Create App That Tracks Your Location

div.a: iOS 6.1 Untethered Jailbreak Now Available For Download

div.div: Following reports that an untethered jailbreak was finally set to be made available for iOS 6.1 users on Monday, the Evad3rs Jailbreak Team has made their jailbreak tool evasi0n available for download.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WK5UnM&via=Digg&text=iOS 6.1 Untethered Jailbreak Now Available For Download

div.div: CARS CAN TALK TO EACH OTHER

div.a: Here Come The Super WiFi Networks?

div.div: The federal government wants to create super WiFi networks across the nation, so powerful and broad in reach that consumers could use them to make calls or surf the Internet without paying a cellphone bill every month.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TwsU9Y&via=Digg&text=Here Come The Super WiFi Networks?

div.a: Beef Price Spike Makes $1 Burger Harder To Stomach

div.div: McDonald's popular $1 McDouble cheeseburger, which has lured customers to the Golden Arches since 2008, is getting hard to sustain as rising beef prices threaten the company's profit margin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14uwYd2&via=Digg&text=Beef Price Spike Makes $1 Burger Harder To Stomach

div.div: So, how many people have I known or seen with gunshot wounds? A lot, as it turns out. I was shocked by the number.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14MybgY&via=Digg&text=My Own Private Body Count

div.a: Iran Wants You To Believe This Is Their Stealth Fighter

div.div: The Iranians would have you believe this is some sort of highly advanced stealth strike aircraft that they've already designed, built and flown. Don't be that gullible.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YttZ19&via=Digg&text=Iran Wants You To Believe This Is Their Stealth Fighter

div.a: Relive Beyoncé’s Super Bowl Halftime Performance In 11 GIFs

div.div: Take a moment and relive the performance in all its GIF-able glory.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wkl7uh&via=Digg&text=Relive Beyoncé’s Super Bowl Halftime Performance In 11 GIFs

div.a: Beautiful Vintage Menus Featuring Gross Vintage Dishes

div.div: Old restaurant menus are often beautiful works of epicurean art, created as part of the complete sensory dining experience to entertain and awe guests. Reading these menus today is both a form of mini-time travel and a horrifying glance at the food habits of yesteryear.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xq1j8g&via=Digg&text=Beautiful Vintage Menus Featuring Gross Vintage Dishes

div.a: The Most Wanted Gun In America

div.div: The phone rings again at Pasadena Pawn and Gun, and a familiar question comes down the line: “Got any ARs?”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vy9y0T&via=Digg&text=The Most Wanted Gun In America
